in.robotix.xantsclient
Class XweenActionProxy

java.lang.Object
  in.robotix.xantsclient.XweenActionProxy

public class XweenActionProxy
extends java.lang.Object

This class is to be used by the client code to encode Xween instructions to be executed on the server side. This will typically be done inside the XweenClient.nextCycle(XweenActionProxy) method.

Constructor Detail

XweenActionProxy

public XweenActionProxy()
Method Detail

extractXantID

public static int extractXantID(java.lang.String rawHint)
Extracts the Xant's ID from a 'raw' hint string. A raw hint string is of the form 'XANT ID &lt;ID&gt; MESSAGE &lt;HINT&gt; '}.

Parameters:
rawHint - The 'raw' hint string to be parsed to extract the ID.
Returns:
The Xant ID parsed or -1 if the string passed to it was invalid.

extractBroadcast

public static java.lang.String extractBroadcast(java.lang.String rawHint)
Extracts the actual hint from a 'raw' hint string. A raw hint string is of the form 'XANT ID &lt;ID&gt; MESSAGE &lt;HINT&gt; '}.

Parameters:
rawHint - The 'raw' hint string to be parsed to extract the ID.
Returns:
The parsed hint or null if the string passed to it was invalid.

connect

public boolean connect(int port)
Called to connect to the simulator server through the specified port. The participant need not be concerned with calling this method.

Parameters:
port - The port to which the client must connect.
Returns:
true if the connection was successfully established.

getNumberOfHints

public int getNumberOfHints()
Gets the total number of hints sent by the various Xants.

Returns:
The number of hints sent by the various Xants to the Xween.

getHint

public java.lang.String getHint(int hint)
Returns a particular hint. Please note that the hint is returned as it is, i.e., in the form 'XANT ID &lt;ID&gt; MESSAGE &lt;HINT&gt; * '}. To extract information out of it use extractXantID(String) and / or extractBroadcast(String).

Parameters:
hint - The (zero-based) index of the hint to be returned.
Returns:
The corresponding hint in the form of a String. Returns null in case of invalid indices.

setBroadcast

public void setBroadcast(java.lang.String b)
Sets the broadcast for the current cycle.

Parameters:
b - The broadcast in the form of a String.

startCycle

public void startCycle()
Called to start one cycle of execution, participants need not worry about calling this method.

endCycle

public void endCycle()
Called to end one cycle of execution, participants need not worry about calling this method.
